# description

**Instance Property**

A string containing the description of the error.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute String description;
```

## Getting Error Properties

- **code**: The error code.
- **domain**: A string containing the error domain.
- **userInfo**: The user info dictionary.

items.description: A string containing the error domain.
